All the reported incidents are part of initiative taken by subreddit "r/2020PoliceBrutality" found at www.reddit.com/r/2020PoliceBrutality 

This subreddit exists to document the violence committed by law enforcement on peaceful protesters during the protests & riots of 2020 following the murder of George Floyd. 

These incidents are documented on Github at github.com/2020PB/police-brutality with further information. If you would like to contribute to this repository, please check the contribution guide at the repository.

All the police brutality incident during the 2020 George Floyd protests are currently recorded at 2020PB/police-brutality GitHub repository.

Please read the Contribution Guidelines first to find out the Incident Report Guidelines and Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ).
NOTE: This opens link on your browser app. You will need GitHub account to report incident in the ‘2020PB/police-brutality’ GitHub repository.
